title: Town of Sins
tags: Sexual Content,Nudity,NSFW,Mature,Adventure,Strategy,Card Battler,Anime,Romance,Trading Card Game,Deckbuilding,Card Game,Free to Play,Action,Action-Adventure,Turn-Based Strategy,Auto Battler,Collectathon,Turn-Based Tactics,2D
description: Town of Sins is a cheeky card game with a unique battle system. Corrupt the city you stumble upon and recruit innocent babes to turn them into powerful women. Upgrade your cards, engage in steamy battles, enjoy epic adventures, and collect the sexiest girls.
